Hey, I’m Aarham!

I am a third year CS Student @ SFU, expecting to graduate in May 2024. I have a passion for problem solving and interest in building services that cater to the needs of many people. As a developer, I have honed skills in various technologies. Currently, I am particularly enjoying C# development within .NET, and have built programs using ASP.NET Core, WPF, and Blazor, as well as video games in Unity. I am also experienced in other technolgies, such as Python, C/C++, and Javascript React/React Native. Apart from building software, I enjoy classical music, basketball, and model designing in Blender!
